TopicTitle: Need help with returning back home

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, it seems that I cant find a tutorial on youtube on how to lunch from lets say, Mun, and make my way back to Kerbin.

I can handle creating maneuvering nodes to Mun, but when I am trying to do it the other way around I just fail...

Can someone like... make a video on how to "go back home" from other planets?

Cheers

1. Get in mun orbit

2. Burn until you are at escape velocity

3. retrograde burn once in kerbin SoI
Watch Scott Manleys Moon Landing tutorial (and also his other tutorials, those aren't the best, but they are pretty good), iirc he also explains how to get back:

Open parachutes.

Win.

Sure, if you want to be inefficient.

It's pretty much the same as transferring to Eve.

Just reach escape velocity along the retrograde path of the mun.

Move a manuever node around that reaches past mun escape velocity until it brings you into kerbin.
